dct_title_s: Phelps & Watson's historical and military map of the border and southern states
dct_description_sm: Prime meridian: Washington.; South Florida shown separately and not included in latitudinal range.; "Entered according to Act of Congress in the year 1862 by Phelps & Watson; in the Clerks Office of the District Court of the Southern District of New York."
